subject:
[cc-devel] [ cctools-Feature Requests-1353655 ] Add geolocation on
	ccHost
body:
Feature Requests item #1353655, was opened at 2005-11-10 19:34
Message generated for change (Settings changed) made by kidproto

https://sourceforge.net/tracker/?func=detail&atid=559969&aid=1353655&group_id=80503

Please note that this message will contain a full copy of the comment thread,
including the initial issue submission, for this request,
not just the latest update.
Category: ccHost
Group: None
Status: Open
Priority: 3
Private: No
Submitted By: Jon Phillips (kidproto)
>Assigned to: Mike Linksvayer (mlinksva)
Summary: Add geolocation on ccHost

Initial Comment:
Generally, this is a feature that creativecommons.org
wants in ccMixter.org and hence, ccHost.

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Comment By: Mike Linksvayer (mlinksva)
Date: 2006-01-25 11:43

Message:
Logged In: YES 
user_id=15056

example of similar: http://freesound.iua.upf.edu/geotagsView.php

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Comment By: Mike Linksvayer (mlinksva)
Date: 2005-11-11 18:04

Message:
Logged In: YES 
user_id=15056

- ask for long/lat in user profile
- show location of users on maps in opportune places
  - eg map all users who have remixed a track
  - include lat long in metadata
